snippet: One or more bombs released from a warplane from Myanmar Friday struck a sugar cane field, as fighting between government forces and an ethnic group pressed against the frontier with China.
abstract: Four people are killed and nine injured when warplane from Myanmar releases bombs on sugar cane field in renewed conflict between government of Myanmar and supporters of ethnic Chinese minority Kokang.
lead_paragraph: One or more bombs released from a warplane from Myanmar Friday struck a sugar cane field, as fighting between government forces and an ethnic group pressed against the frontier with China.

headline.main: Myanmar Warplane Kills Four Farmers in China
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Deadly Intrusion Is Denounced
